org.dspace.eperson

Class EPerson

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dspace.content.DSpaceObject
      • org.dspace.eperson.EPerson
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, DSpaceObjectLegacySupport

    @Entity
public class EPerson
extends DSpaceObject
implements DSpaceObjectLegacySupport
    Class representing an e-person.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    David Stuve

      • setLanguage

        public void setLanguage(Context context,
               String language)
                 throws SQLException
        Set the EPerson's language. Value is expected to be a Unix/POSIX Locale specification of the form {language} or {language}_{territory}, e.g. "en", "en_US", "pt_BR" (the latter is Brazilian Portugese).
        Parameters:
        language - language code
        Throws:
        SQLException
